ow.messaging での MessagingAddress の使用
 

MessagingAddress を実装している ow.messaging のクラス
 class InetMessagingAddress
          A MessagingAddress for UDP and TCP Messaging services.
 

MessagingAddress を返す ow.messaging のメソッド
 MessagingAddress MessagingProvider.getMessagingAddress(int port)
          Returns a MessagingAddress for the caller itself with the given port number.
 MessagingAddress MessagingProvider.getMessagingAddress(java.lang.String hostAndPort)
          Returns a MessagingAddress with the given hostname and port number in the following format: hostname:port or hostname/port.
 MessagingAddress MessagingProvider.getMessagingAddress(java.lang.String hostAndPort, int defaultPort)
          Returns a MessagingAddress with the given hostname and port number.
 MessagingAddress MessagingProvider.getMessagingCollectorAddress()
          Returns the address to which all sent messages are reported.
 MessagingAddress MessageReceiver.getSelfAddress()
          Returns SocketAddress of the node itself.
 MessagingAddress MessagingProvider.setMessagingCollectorAddress(MessagingAddress addr)
          Sets an address to which all sent messages are reported.
 

MessagingAddress 型のパラメータを持つ ow.messaging のメソッド
 void MessageSender.send(MessagingAddress dest, Message msg)
          Send the given message one-way.
 Message MessageSender.sendAndReceive(MessagingAddress dest, Message msg)
          Send the given message, wait for a message and receive it.
 MessagingAddress MessagingProvider.setMessagingCollectorAddress(MessagingAddress addr)
          Sets an address to which all sent messages are reported.
